DOC.detailed_description: The consumption food nutritional supplement hemodialysis treatment show improve nutritional status , improve quality life , reduce mortality . Despite observation , allow patient eat food hemodialysis treatment sometimes restrict United States . The reason restrictive policy multi-factorial , include concern related drop blood pressure BP reduce efficiency solute removal follow eat HD treatment . An alternative eating solid food provide patient liquid nutritional supplement . Clinics US likely allow consumption liquid nutritional supplement , however , little known effect liquid supplement blood pressure treatment efficiency . Therefore , investigator plan examine effect nutritional supplementation hemodialysis treatment hemodynamics treatment efficiency crossover design .
